name: Colt M1860 Army
description: The Colt Army Model 1860 is a cap & ball .44-caliber revolver.  It was used during the American Civil War, and made by Colt's Manufacturing Company.

name: LeMat revolver
description: A F. LLI Pietta reproduction of the LeMat revolver, a rare and unusual firearm produced during the civil war.  While its original non-standard .42 or .35 caliber curbed its usefulness for the CSA army, this reproduction is offered in more prevalent .44 caliber.  Despite modern quality materials, the design is still rather delicate.
